physical_appearance: "This is a cheongsam that is paired with a long-sleeved matching jacket. The cheongsam hs short sleeves. There are floral patterns all over the cheongsam and the jacket. A collar is present on the cheongsam and on the jacket. There are three buttons running down the centre of the jacket's front. They are circular in shape. There are no visible tears on the cheongsam and the jacket. There is a label tag that is titled, ""Peony"" located at the collar of the jacket."
sgcool_label_text: This cheongsam and its matching jacket were made from fabric purchased from Liberty London. The jacket has a tailor’s label and address. The cheongsam and jacket was tailored at a local tailor, “Peony”, at No. 8 Lorong 22 Geylang, Singapore. Cheongsams with matching jackets were usually worn at more formal occasions.
title_text: Cheongsam and matching jacket with blue floral motif
subject_terms_1: dresses (garments) womenswear allover patterns floral patterns tailor-made
context_20: This item was located at a local tailor shop called Peony
subject_terms_2: Qipao Ethnic costume Jackets Women's clothing Motifs Custom-made clothing
